descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Blake Griffin loses Domantas Sabonis with a behind-the-back dribble, then spins by Myles Turner for a layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Griffin shows off handles, then spins for a basket) 2021/02/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Griffin shows off handles, then spins for a basket

videos.description: Domantas Sabonis sinks a 3-pointer right before the first quarter comes to a close.
videos.headline: Sabonis' 3-pointer beats buzzer
